name: silver-carnival
description: A js13k 2016 entry and demonstrator for outbrk, a tiny game engine

scripts.dist: node ./node_modules/browserify/index.js -o dist/silver-carnival.js src/silver-carnival.js && node ./node_modules/uglifyjs/bin/uglifyjs dist/silver-carnival.js > dist/silver-carnival.min.js

author: Scott Elcomb
